title: Bug 7945Search results not selected in external jar
description: Build 200201151. Make sure you have JDK1.3.1 as the default JRE (and that you have source forrt.jar)2. Open java.io.File3. Select field 'tmpFir'4. Searcg for references to this field5. You should get 3 matches in method getTempDir()6. Doubleclick on the search resultObserve: The first match is not selected.
